title: The Holographic Void Lily
data:
| (   The Holographic Void Lily   [![Credit card.png](/images/5/52/Credit_card.png)](/wiki/File:Credit_card.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Base item                                                                                                      | [credit card](/wiki/Credit_card "Credit card")                                                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| Affiliation                                                                                                    | - [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic")
- [Cartomancer](/wiki/Cartomancer "Cartomancer")
- [intelligent](/wiki/Intelligent_artifacts "Intelligent artifacts")                                |
|                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| When carried                                                                                                   | * [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage")
* [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection")
* [energy regeneration](/wiki/Energy_regeneration "Energy regeneration") |
| When used                                                                                                      | - unlocks doors                                                                                                                                                                           |
| When invoked                                                                                                   | * [summons monsters](/wiki/Create_monster "Create monster")                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                |                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| Base price                                                                                                     | 7000 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                                                                                                        |
| Weight                                                                                                         | [4](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                                                                                |

**The Holographic Void Lily** is the [Cartomancer](/wiki/Cartomancer "Cartomancer") [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact"). When carried, it provides [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage"), [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection"), and fast [energy regeneration](/wiki/Energy_regeneration "Energy regeneration"). The Holographic Void Lily generates up to 10 monsters around the user when [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke").

## Strategy

Summoning monsters with the Holographic Void Lily can be used as an unlimited resource of [create monster](/wiki/Create_monster "Create monster") for sacrificing and farming, although the usefulness of this effect is questionable after completing the quest. The Holographic Void Lily is also desirable for its energy regeneration and slotless reflection; no other chaotic artifact provides these properties, thus making it a potential artifact wish for non-Cartomancers.

## Origin

The name "Holographic Void Lily" is a reference to the card Black Lotus, the most expensive and powerful *Magic: the Gathering* card of all time.

## Encyclopedia entry

All that glitters is not gold.

Summoning monsters with the Holographic Void Lily can be used as an unlimited resource of create monster for sacrificing and farming, although the usefulness of this effect is questionable after completing the quest. The Holographic Void Lily is also desirable for its energy regeneration and slotless reflection; no other chaotic artifact provides these properties, thus making it a potential artifact wish for non-Cartomancers.
